general.name: Leaky Without Looking
general.description: It's fastest to poop eggs into Leaky from the cliff above without looking at him.

general.name: Skip Shock Jump Cutscene with Leaky
general.description: This cutscene can be overlayed on top of Leaky's sandcastle cutscene to skip it.

general.name: Nipper Skip
general.description: It is possible to clip inside of Nipper and hit him from behind for a faster fight. Both methods are outlined here

general.name: Lighthouse Flightless
general.description: Through massive slope abuse it is possible to reach the lighthouse without using flight.

outofbounds.name: TTC Early
outofbounds.description: You can get into TTC without having to open the level.
